class_c_06_history_01:
Greetings, my little students. Whatever you did
yesterday, it is now a part of history.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_02:
Today, we will continue to unravel the marvels
that history has presented to us.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_03:
I trust that you all remember our lesson before
the midterm exam concerning the Great Crater\r
of Paldea and its interior—Area Zero.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_04:
This mysterious crater captured the imaginations
of many—including the former Paldean emperor.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_05:
Two hundred years ago, a group of explorers
claimed to have finally reached its depths.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_06:
The name of the team that achieved this great
feat was the Area Zero Expedition.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_07:
The team is said to have been made up of
Paldea’s best and brightest.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_08:
Skilled battlers, brilliant researchers—talented
individuals of all kinds.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_09:
Among the list of team members was the name
of a man who was an author and brilliant natural\r
historian: [VAR COLOR(0006)]Heath[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_10:
After returning from the expedition to Area Zero,
he used his literary talent to record the events of\r
the expedition and publish them.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_11:
Aha. Perfect timing to make eye contact, young
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_12:
Let’s see if you were paying attention.\c
What was the name of the team that first made it
to the deepest reaches of the Great Crater?[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_answer_01:
Incorrect! I see that even your little head has
become full of dreams of adventure.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_answer_02:
Correct! To pick up on and remember a term I
simply slipped into the flow of the lecture...\r
You really are quite the clever one.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_answer_03:
Incorrect! Though I will admit that an expedition
and a survey corps may take part in very\r
similar activities![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_13:
The correct name for this team was the Area
Zero Expedition![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_14:
The record of their activities written by the
expedition member Heath can be found in\r
bookstores and the like even today.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_15a: This record is now known as the[VAR COLOR(0006)] Scarlet Book[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_15b: This record is now known as the[VAR COLOR(0006)] Violet Book[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_16:
At the time, the entire region of Paldea was
absolutely buzzing about Area Zero.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_17a:
The Scarlet Book was so popular that practically
everyone had a copy.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_17b:
The Violet Book was so popular that practically
everyone had a copy.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_18:
However, the book itself was full of fantastical
descriptions and illustrations of things that could\r
never be thought of as real.\c
The masses began to call Heath a liar.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_19:
Even the truth of the expedition making it to the
bottom of the crater was called into question.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_20a:
The Scarlet Book was condemned to the shelves
of used bookstores as just another book of wild\r
paranormal stories.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_20b:
The Violet Book was condemned to the shelves
of used bookstores as just another book of wild\r
paranormal stories.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_21:
There’s a copy on one of the bookshelves on the
ground floor of the entrance hall.\c
Feel free to have a read if you’re interested.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_22:
Oho, is that the time already? I must’ve gotten
swept up in filling your minds with knowledge.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_06_history_23:
This ends today’s lesson. We will unravel more of
history’s enigmas together next time.[VAR 0114(0027)]
